functionDecorators.name: createDaoTxOne
functionDecorators.description: Create the DAO and initialise the basic apps necessary for gardens.

parameterDecorators.name: _fundingPoolStake
parameterDecorators.description: Initial amount of tokens in the funding pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputableVotingSettings
parameterDecorators.description: Array of [voteDuration, voteSupportRequired, voteMinAcceptanceQuorum, voteDelegatedVotingPeriod, voteQuietEndingPeriod, voteQuietEndingExtension, voteExecutionDelay] to set up the voting app of the organization.

functionDecorators.name: createTokenholders
functionDecorators.description: Add tokenholders, only accessible between the first and second createDao transactions.

functionDecorators.name: createDaoTxThree
functionDecorators.description: Add, initialise and activate the agreement.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitrator
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the IArbitrator that will be used to resolve disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _setAppFeesCashier
parameterDecorators.description: Whether to integrate with the IArbitrator's fee cashier.

parameterDecorators.name: _content
parameterDecorators.description: Link to a human-readable text that describes the initial rules for the Agreement.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakingFactory
parameterDecorators.description: Staking factory for finding each collateral token's staking pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeToken
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token used for the arbitration fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeDuration
parameterDecorators.description: Challenge duration, during which the submitter can raise a dispute.

functionDecorators.name: createDaoTxTwo
functionDecorators.description: Add and initialise issuance and conviction voting.

parameterDecorators.name: _stableToken
parameterDecorators.description: Stable token address for conviction voting proposals with stable request amounts.

parameterDecorators.name: _convictionSettings
parameterDecorators.description: array of conviction settings: [decay, max_ratio, weight, min_threshold_stake_percentage].
